Plugin project setup

Before proceeding, be sure to have installed and configured the Symbiota2 development environment.

In order to setup a new plugin project, you must have a name for your plugin. If you have not already, please read the section on selecting a name for your plugin on the initial considerations page.

If you have a name selected for your plugin, create a new directory in the plugins directory of your Symbiota2 installation and name it the name you have selected for your plugin. This directory will serve as the root directory for your plugin project.
